sr-103-012 c2 audit was not configured (via sp_configure). c2 audit mode allows auditing of attempts, both successful and unsuccessful, to access objects. it also ensures that the server will automatically shut down if it is unable to log an event (although this may not be desirable in every organisation). 
 sr-103-012 c2 audit not configured medium
